entity

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses an array of images to create an animation with a certain delay between each frame.
    Author:
    Trevor Aquino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation()
      create an Animation object

      void setDelay(long d)
      sets the delay in between each sprite to this number in milliseconds
      void setSprite(int s)
      sets the animation to this sprite in the cycle
      void setSprites(java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] sprites)
      sets this array of images to be the sprites which will be cycled through
      void update()
      if the proper amount of time has passed, set the currentSprite to the next sprite in the cycle

        Parameters:
